5600.name: Meteor Shower - Critical Bleed
5600.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 42% chance of inflicting Bleed on the target during a general critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5601.name: Meteor Shower - Rsk. Haste
5601.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by 11% when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Rsk. Haste

5602.name: Elysian - Health
5602.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Health

5603.name: Elysian - Anger
5603.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases Max HP by 15% and increases P. Atk. by 32. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Anger

5604.name: Elysian - Critical Drain
5604.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. During a critical attack, absorbs 19 HP from target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5605.name: Branch of the Mother Tree - Conversion
5605.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Conversion

5606.name: Branch of the Mother Tree - Magic Damage
5606.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 30% chance of inflicting an additional power 8 of magical damage when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5607.name: Branch of the Mother Tree - Acumen
5607.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

5608.name: Carnage Bow - Light
5608.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases weight gauge by 20%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5609.name: Carnage Bow - Critical Bleed
5609.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 35% chance of inflicting Bleed on the target during a general critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5610.name: Carnage Bow - Mana Up
5610.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

5611.name: Soul Bow - Cheap Shot
5611.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. During a general attack, decreases MP consumption to 1 with a 38% chance. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5612.name: Soul Bow - Quick Recovery
5612.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases re-use delay by about 15%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5613.name: Soul Bow - Critical Poison
5613.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 18% chance of inflicting poison on the target during a general critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5614.name: Bloody Orchid - Focus
5614.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical by 67. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

5615.name: Bloody Orchid - Back Blow
5615.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 37% when attacking a target from behind. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Back Blow

5616.name: Bloody Orchid - Critical Bleed
5616.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 12% chance of inflicting Bleed on the target during a general critical attack. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

5617.name: Soul Separator - Guidance

5618.name: Soul Separator - Critical Damage

5650.name: Seed: Alternative Dark Coda
5650.description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Gludio area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Dark Coda. For best results, a level 5-15 character must plant it on a level 5-15 monster. Sowing
